title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. S(UP)PORTS.
5. CHASTE (homophone).3
10. ROOKS (2 meanings).
11. NE(VER MIN)D (den rev.).
12. FR (E)IGHT.
13. RU(ST)LER.
14. F-L-AT TIRE.
16. TOPED (rev.).
19. NO(RM)S.
21. CO(LLA)PSE (all rev.).
24. UPSCALE (anag.).
26. B(R)OTHER.
27. TE(LEVIS)ES.
28. G-AUNT.
29. SAD-IST (it's anag.).
30. FEATHERS (hidden).

Down

1. ST-RIFE.
2. PROP(ELL)ER.
3. ON SIGHT (anag.).
4. TEN(E)T.
6. HARD-SET (anag.).
7. STILL (2 meanings).
8. EL DORADO (hidden).
9. O-VERSE-LL.
15. IN C(RE)ASE.
17. POS(T HOU)SE.
19. IN QUOTES (anag.).
20. S-CRAVES.
22. A(MO)NGST.
23. G-RATIS (sitar anag.).
25. SO-LID.
26. BASTE (homophone).
